name: Cole Slaw
haiku:
Serve cold with burgers
              Or barbecue or chicken
              A big pile for lunch
ingredients:
1 Head green cabbage diced rustic style
                    ½ Onion diced small
                    2 Carrots, grated thick
                    Dressing:
                    1 Cup mayonnaise or vegan mayo
                    1 T white vinegar or other flavored vinegars (rice wine vinegars are nice)
                    2 T sugar
                    2 T water
                    ½ Teaspoon celery seed
                    Salt and coarse pepper or Cajun seasoning such as Tony’s
directions: Mix all ingredients and chill. Serve with burgers, barbecue, chicken or just eat a huge plate for your lunch!
